summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to advertise for sale negotiable bond of the City of Seattle. in the sum of Four Hundred Twenty-one Thousand Dollars ($421,000), voted at the general election held in the City of Seattle. on the 8th day of March, 1910, under and by virtue of Ordinance No. 23217, approved February 1, 1910; and declaring an emergency.
